Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Montrose following an earlier door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Montrose following an earlier door problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana, 134th, Langley, and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Indiana, 134th, Langley, and 130th due to, street blockage near 130th/Eberhart.

Allow extra travel time.
